template.name: Input
template.pattern: \s* EXECUTION OF GAMESS BEGUN.*$\s*$\s*ECHO OF THE FIRST FEW.*
template.comment:
EXECUTION OF GAMESS BEGUN Thu Jun 12 13:14:45 2008
ECHO OF THE FIRST FEW INPUT CARDS - INPUT CARD> $CONTRL SCFTYP=RHF RUNTYP=OPTIMIZE EXETYP=RUN INPUT CARD> COORD=ZMT NZVAR=42 INPUT CARD> QMTTOL=5.0E-6 NPRINT=-5 ICHARG=0 MULT=1 INPUT CARD> ISPHER=-1 INPUT CARD> $END INPUT CARD> $SYSTEM TIMLIM=14400 MWORDS=50 MEMDDI=0 PARALL=.T. $END INPUT CARD> $DFT DFTTYP=B3LYP $END INPUT CARD> $BASIS GBASIS=CCD $END INPUT CARD> $SCF DIRSCF=.T. FDIFF=.T. NPUNCH=0 DIIS=.T. CONV=1.0E-5 $END INPUT CARD> $GUESS GUESS=HUCKEL $END INPUT CARD> $STATPT NSTEP=100 OPTTOL=0.0001 NPRT=-2 NPUN=-2 $END INPUT CARD> $ZMAT DLC=.T. AUTO=.T.
